author: wn.com
title: Voter information card errors trigger confusion amid tight election race
text: Elections Canada is fielding a barrage of questions and complaints about errors on voter information cards. Stories have been surfacing across the country about thousands of cards advising voters to cast their ballots at the wrong location â€” in some cases, at polling stations hundreds of kilometres away. ...
